id.description: The id of the authorization code.

$block: Represents the model containing an authorization code used to unlock a feature in machines and EDT

$ul: **Code**: The code to enter to unlock a feature. Read only.
**CreatedByUserID**: The ID of the user that created this authorization code. Read only.
**CreatedDate**: A timestamp of when this code was created. Read only.
**DataParameters**: The parameters and values contained as data in this authorization code. May not be updated.
**DefinitionID**: The id of the definition for this authorization code. May not be updated.
**DeletedByUserID**: The ID of the user that deleted this authorization code. Read only.
**DeletedDate**: A timestamp of when this authorization code was deleted. Read only.
**EffectiveDate**: A date at which this code should begin being valid. Optional. Set on create only.
**ID**: The identifier for the authorization code. Read only.
**IsDeleted**: Indicates whether this code is deleted.
**ValidationParameters**: The parameters and values used to validate this authorization code. May not be updated.
